sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of your <radical>yoga</radical> class uses a special <radical>brush</radical> to stay <kanji>healthy</kanji>. She rubs the brush on her long arms and legs, and she never ever gets sick.
meaningInfo: If you want to be healthy too, just do yoga and rub this healthy brush all over your bod.
readingMnemonic: Not everyone wants to be <kanji>healthy</kanji>, but <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the samurai sure does. He needs to be ready at a moment's notice so he can do tasks for other people. He's at every class, rubbing himself down with the brush.
readingInfo: Imagine Ken, the picture of samurai health, doing yoga and getting that brush all up in those bits.
